CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- --log(self.KoreanName .. " " .. self.Cost .. "원")
local ProductionInfo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/ProductionUI/ProductionInfo") local CalledBy = ProductionInfo.ProductionUIManager.CalledBy local Money = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/common").Common.BuilderMoney
if isvalid(CalledBy) then if Money >= self.Cost then CalledBy.Barrack:Production(self.Name, self.Cost) else --log("돈이 부족합니다.") end else ProductionInfo:SetVisible(false) ProductionInfo:SetEnable(false) end
